title: Man charged in fatal shooting of roommate
content:
SAN ANTONIO - A man died Sunday after San Antonio police said he was accidentally shot and killed.
Early Sunday evening San Antonio police arrested the mans 29-year-old roommate.
Police said he is facing a charge of manslaughter.
Police said they believe a friend of the 43-year-old victim shot the suspect at an apartment complex on Perrin Beitel Road.
The shooting occurred around 1:45 p.m.
The man was shot in the upper body. He was taken to San Antonio Military Medical Center in critical condition, but died a short time later.
